DOC.criteria: Male female patient age > =18 < 65 year confirm diagnosis HIV receive stable regimen ATRIPLA , COMPLERA , STRIBILD , TRIUMEQ , approve antiretroviral protease inhibitor atazanavir , darunavir , indinavir , ritonavir , saquinavir combination ( preferably ) TRIUMEQ consistent recent prescribe information document least 6 week concomitant administration single oral dose 0.5 mg riociguat No clinical evidence pulmonary hypertension Written inform consent Severe diseases assumed pharmacokinetics effect study drug normal History coronary artery disease Symptomatic postural hypotension ( e.g . dizziness , lightheadedness ) History bronchial asthma airway disease Renal impairment creatinine clearance < 15 mL/min Severe hepatic impairment ( ChildPugh class C ) Systolic blood pressure 100 mmHg
